title: Nintendo Direct Tomorrow, Wild Predictions Today - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.08.22
description:
Nintendo's got a direct tomorrow, and Tim had wild predictions today!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:20 - Housekeeping
A new episode of PSILY is up, and it’s a banger talking about PlayStation’s 10 new live service games.
Blessing’s taking over Xbox's Twitch channel in celebration of Black History Month! He’ll be playing some of his favorite games from Rare Replay. Tune in at Noon Pacific Time on Twitch.tv/Xbox to watch live.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:07:30 - NINTENDO DIRECT INCOMING!
00:14:55 - I think most likely we will see Mario Kart 9 as the big release to close out the direct. - Best Friends Q:Nevans Island
00:20:00 - my predictions for tomorrows Nintendo Direct is the announcement of Goldeneye - Best Friends Q:BanderSN
00:30:38 - think they'll announce that you can buy the individual Mario 3D All-Stars titles on the Nintendo store, - Best Friends Q:KBABZ
00:36:45 - We all know a Nintendo Direct can only mean one thing: Fire Emblem. - Best Friends Q:Steven James Oslund
00:40:25 - Ad
00:46:40 - Telltale Returns tomorrow!
00:48:58- Apex: No Sequel, but PS5 Version?
00:51:55 - Gayming Awards 2022 Noms
00:54:30 - Rockstar Still Cares About Single-Player, Eddie Mack-ooh @ GameSpot
01:00:25 - Tom Holland’s Dream Video Game Movie is…
01:02:20 - Out today
01:04:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and VGC’s Jordan Middler
itunes:author: Kinda Funny

content:encoded:
Nintendo's got a direct tomorrow, and Tim had wild predictions today!


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:06:20 - Housekeeping

A new episode of PSILY is up, and it’s a banger talking about PlayStation’s 10 new live service games.

Blessing’s taking over Xbox's Twitch channel in celebration of Black History Month! He’ll be playing some of his favorite games from Rare Replay. Tune in at Noon Pacific Time on Twitch.tv/Xbox to watch live.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack

The Roper Report  -

00:07:30 - NINTENDO DIRECT INCOMING!

00:14:55 - I think most likely we will see Mario Kart 9 as the big release to close out the direct. - Best Friends Q:Nevans Island

00:30:38 - think they'll announce that you can buy the individual Mario 3D All-Stars titles on the Nintendo store, - Best Friends Q:KBABZ

00:36:45 - We all know a Nintendo Direct can only mean one thing: Fire Emblem. - Best Friends Q:Steven James Oslund
